html: Update: The incident at St. Patrick-St. Anthony Parish is resolved. The building was searched by an explosives K-9 from the Michigan State Police with nothing further located. There is no evidence of an on-going threat and the suspect is lodged at the Ottawa County Jail.
text:
Update:

The incident at St. Patrick-St. Anthony Parish is resolved. 

The building was searched by an explosives K-9 from the Michigan State Police with nothing further located. 

There is no evidence of an on-going threat and the suspect is lodged at the Ottawa County Jail.

html: On this D-Day anniversary I’m thinking of a vet I recently met who landed on Omaha Beach after lied about his age (17!) to enter the Army. After the war he finished high-school but then fought for 16 mo. in Korea! That truly is the #GreatestGeneration!

The #TaxCutsandJobsAct is pro-family →
 The Child Tax Credit is doubled to $2,000.
 The Child and Dependent Care Tax Credit is preserved.
 The Adoption Tax Credit is preserved.
